document_data.name: Shadowtome
document_data.author: [[Shadowhands]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Shadowtome''''' was an [[arcane]] [[spellbook]] penned by the mysterious [[wizard]] known only as [[Shadowhands]]. It contained 9 [[spell]]s ranging from common to unique or rare.
document_data.Description: A pair of wooden covers protected the beaten [[electrum]] pages within the book. Stretched black and silver [[crocodile]] skin covered the wood. The book had a single clasp that looked like a black [[human]] hand that swiveled to grab a bestial hooked tail.
document_data.Powers:
The ''Shadowtome'' contained the following spells:
:''[[dispel magic]]'' • ''[[missile mastery]]'' • ''[[nightscar]]'' • ''[[polymorph other]]'' • ''[[animate dead]]'' • ''[[cloudkill]]'' • ''[[lesser ironguard]]'' • ''[[death spell]]'' • ''[[backlash]]''
document_data.History: The tome was initially found in [[Calimport]] by [[Azkhazan]]. It changed hands several times after that, even passing into [[Elminster]]'s care for a brief period.
